## 2025 GENERAL SPORTS OFFER PRODUCT FACT FILE
2025

SPORTS FEED SERVICE

PRODUCT FACT FILE
## SPORTS FEED SERVICE

## EDITORIAL FORMAT

• A real-time sports news feed

• Production available in 6 languages: French, English, German, Spanish, Arabic and Portuguese

• Hourly coverage: 24/7, in real time

Non-regionalised feed


| Description | Sports coverage |
| --- | --- |
| Sports events | Football, cycling, cricket, Formula 1, rugby, tennis, athletics, basketball, golf, handball, swimming and much more... |
| Sports extras | Football, cycling, cricket, Formula 1, rugby, tennis, athletics, basketball, golf, handball, swimming and much more... |

2025

## SID SPORTS TEXT SERVICE PRODUCT FACT FILE
## SID SPORTS TEXT Service

## EDITORIAL FORMAT

Aimed at a German-speaking media, corporate and institutional clientele living mainly in Germany or in Europe and looking for rich coverage of sports news.

German correspondents present in Paris, Brussels, Washington, Istanbul.

• Hourly coverage: 24/7 in real time.

## COVERAGE

• Rich coverage of sports relating to themes: football, tennis, athletics, etc.

• Sporting information managed by the SID office based in Cologne, aimed primarily at a German-speaking clientele looking for German sports news in real time.

• Focus on German sports and the performance of German athletes.

The feed also covers other sports as well as the main national and special events

■ Athletics

■ Basketball

■ Cyclism

■ Handball

■ Motor sports

■ Ski

■ Football

■ Tennis

■ Olympics

<div style="text-align: center;">Coverage details ^** </div>


![0/imgs/img_in_chart_box_375_573_879_1047.jpg](imgs/img_in_chart_box_375_573_879_1047.jpg)


## PRODUCT FORMATS

• Delivery of metadata: XML, NewsML and jpg, if the story includes photos.

## SUBSCRIPTION

• Monthly subscription to the complete feed or to a selection within the feed

## DELIVERY METHODS

• FTP or satellite

• AFP

• Forum

• SIDForum

• API

 ^* Average volume from January to December 2024

**Average over one year, given as an indication, likely to vary according to current events**
2025

SPORTING INFORMATION FEED

IN ARABIC (ARB SPORT)

PRODUCT FACT FILE
# SPORTING INFORMATION FEED IN ARABIC

## “ARB SPORT” EDITION

## EDITORIAL FORMAT

Aimed at Arabic-speaking customers interested in world and regional sports news.

• Validated by the Nicosia desk.

AFP has Arabic-speaking sports editors writing in Arabic, present in all countries of the region.

• Hourly coverage: 6am to 10pm GMT, 7 days a week, in real time.

## COVERAGE

• Rich coverage of sports relating to themes: football, tennis, athletics, motor racing sports, etc.

- The feed also covers other sports as well as the main special, national and international (football World Cup, etc.) events.


| Forecasts | Time (GMT) | DELIVERY METHODS |
| --- | --- | --- |
| “Sports forecast menu” | 11:30am | Forecasts on ARB Sport service themes: football, athletics, tennis, basketball. |

<div style="text-align: center;">Coverage details ^** </div>


30 ^* 

Reports per day

(excluding updates)

## PRODUCT FORMATS

NewsML-G2, IIM, NewsML-1.1, ANPA

## SPORTS PHOTO SERVICE

2025

PRODUCT FACT FILE
## SPORTS PHOTO SERVICE

## EDITORIAL FORMAT

• Pictures captioned in English and classified according to IPTC norms.

• The number of pictures can reach 1,200 per day during weekends or for major special events.

• Coverage: 24/7, in real-time

## Sports coverage

Sports events

## Description

Football, cycling, cricket, Formula 1, rugby, tennis, athletics, basketball, golf, handball, swimming and much more...

Sports extras

Sporting Institutions (IOC, FIFA, federations, clubs, athletes, sponsors).



Other themes relating to sport such as doping, justice, people, etc.

## Coverage details**

photos per day

• Image size via satellite: 1.5MB

• Image size via FTP:

1.5MB

• Formats via AFP Forum: 512 pixels, 768 pixels or original size

• 800 KB for Africa

# SPORTS INFOGRAPHICS & VIDEOGRAPHICS SERVICE

## SPORTS VIDEOGRAPHICS

## EDITORIAL FORMAT

Videographics combine text, images, video and 3D modelling elements with audio voice-over and a separate dopesheet

• Formats dedicated to digital and audiovisual media: TV, online editors, mobiles, tablets, public screens... Available in 6 languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Arabic, and Portuguese

Separate audio voice-over and script

Ready to publish format or editable format for translation and integration into your story.

## Sports coverage

## Description

Sports events Systematic coverage of special events : Winter and Summer Olympic Games, FIFA World Cup

Sports extras

Focus on new technologies and innovations in sports, including in Formula 1

75 ^* 

videographics per year

SPORTS DATA FEED

PRODUCT FACT FILE
## The largest catalogue of sports data

• More than 2,000 streams of sporting results covered per year

• Sporting data and performance statistics on the main matches and all competitions in real time

Reliable, accurate and timely feeds, suitable for all types of media

Available in 18 languages including French, English, German, Spanish, Italian, Chinese and Portuguese

Other languages available


| Sports coverage | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Football | Domestic leagues, international cups, European competitions |
| Formula 1 | World championship |
| Cycling | World championship |
| Rugby | World Cup, Top 14, Pro D2, Champions Cup, 6 Nations |
| Basketball | NBA, Euroleague, Europe Cup, EuroCup, World Cup |
| Olympic Games | Summer and Winter Games |
| Tennis | ATP / WTA, Billie Jean King Cup and Davis Cup |
| Athletics | World Athletics meetings, World Championships, Diamond League |
| Volleyball | Women's and Men's European Volleyball Championships |


| PRODUCT FORMATS | | SUBSCRIPTION | DELIVERY METHODS |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| XML | • | One or several competitions / sports. | Widgets |
| JSON | • | One-off events (one-shot) | Via API, for optimal integration |
|  |  |  | Database-to-database replication |
2025

AFPTV SPORTS

FR & EN

PRODUCT FACT FILE
## AFPTV SPORTS IN FRENCH

## EDITORIAL FORMAT

• Raw images with or without sound.

• Fully edited video reports

• Video length: from 30 seconds to 4 minutes / profiles and features: up to 10 minutes

Intended for broadcasters, production companies and other media

• Product to be edited by the client

## COVERAGE

News and big competitions

• Press conferences, training sessions, fan reactions, business, etc.

• European football championships (Ligue 1, Liga, EPL), Champions League, Europa League (final)

• Special events: Football World Cup, Olympic and Paralympic Games...

Red Bull Media House provides editorial content on a wide range of sporting disciplines from racing to esports and extreme sports in various locations around the world: 250 photos and 15 videos per month

• Original reports and illustrative images


| SLUG | Product | Edited sequences | Voice-over | Sound bite dubbing | Extra rushes | Script | Editable sequences | Sepsoundt rack |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| IMAGES | Raw footage with ambient sound, no sound or voice-over | ☒ | ☒ | ☒ | ☒ | ✓ | ✓ | ✓ |
| ITV-IMAGES | Raw images with sound (statements, speeches, interviews, etc.) | ☐ | ☐ | ☐ | ☐ | ✓ | ✓ | ✓ |

![10/imgs/img_in_image_box_708_931_937_1031.jpg](imgs/img_in_image_box_708_931_937_1031.jpg)

## AFPTV SPORTS IN ENGLISH

## EDITORIAL FORMAT

• Raw images with or without sound

• Fully edited video reports

• Video length: from 30 seconds to 4 minutes / profiles and features: up to 10 minutes

Intended for broadcasters, production companies and other media

• Product to be edited by the client

## COVERAGE

News and big competitions

• Press conferences, training sessions, fan reactions, business, etc.

• European football championships (Ligue 1, Liga, Premier League, Bundesliga, Serie A), Champions League, Europa League (final)

• Special events: Football World Cup, Olympic and Paralympic Games...

Red Bull Media House provides editorial content on a wide range of sporting disciplines from racing to esports and extreme sports in various locations around the world: 250 photos and 15 videos per month

Original reports and illustrative images


| SLUG | Product | Edited sequences | Voice-over | Sound bite dubbing | Extra rushes | Script | Editable sequences | Sepsoundt rack |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| RAW | Raw footage with ambient sound, with or without sound, no voice-over | ☒ |  |  | ☒ |  |  |  |
|  | ☒ | ☒ |  | ✓ | ✓ | ✓ |
| NSV | Fully edited, with no voice-over and dubbing | ✓ |  |  | ✓ |  |  |  |

2025

AFP SPORTS STORIES

PRODUCT FACT FILE
## DESCRIPTION

• Multimedia reports consisting of text, photos, infographics, video and contextualised video; ready-to-use articles

## EDITORIAL FORMAT

• Automatic integration of articles into the client’s site:

✓ Integration of articles in real time in chronological order for easy and complete online access

✓ Customised content integration to suit the client’s content and upload preferences



• Multiple editorial and technical formats for optimised adaptation to all digital media: web and mobile sites, public screens and any other interactive information medium and connected TV.

## ADDED VALUE

• Productivity gains for media departments for non-core topics, thanks to instant publication of content and continuous feed to web and mobile sites

• Sections adapted to suit each production language

• Unique metadata to index and reference each news story

## AVAILABLE LANGUAGES

• Service available in 9 languages: French, English, German, Spanish, Arabic, Portuguese, simplified and traditional Chinese.

108 ^* 

Articles illustrated per day (all languages)


| Languages | Number of sections |
| --- | --- |
| French | 3 |
| English | 5 |
| Spanish | 6 |
| German | 19 |
| Portuguese | 2 |
| Arabic | 1 |
| Chinese | 1 |

## PRODUCT FORMATS

• Text: NewsML 1.2, XML, HTML, NewsML G2 formats

• Photos: rectangular formats 768px, 245px, 110px

square formats 220px, 170px, 120px

Videos: Mpeg4 H.264, Flash, MP2 PAL

## SUBSCRIPTION

DELIVERY METHODS

To the section

Feed

FTP

API

AFP Forum
